INDEX_VIDEO_AUTO

static final int INDEX_VIDEO_AUTO
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getVideoCount

int getVideoCount()
Get number of available video streams 
 A video stream is defined as a combination of 
 bitrate and camera angle (merge internal stream 
 and video track).

Returns:
Number of available video streams. Return -1 if get failed.

getAudioCount

int getAudioCount()
Get number of available audio streams 
 An audio stream is defined as a combination of 
 language and codec type. An audio stream may have
 multiple audio bitrates. The final playback bitrate 
 depends on selected video stream.

Returns:
Number of available audio stream. Returns -1 if get failed.

getSubtitleCount

int getSubtitleCount()
Get number of available subtitle streams

Returns:
Number of available subtitle streams. Returns -1 if get failed.

selectVideo

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE selectVideo(int index)
Select video stream by its index.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of video stream. Valid from 0. The availability of video streams depends on current selection of uncommitted audio and subtitle streams.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

selectAudio

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE selectAudio(int index)
Select audio stream by its index.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of audio stream. Valid from 0. The availability of audio streams depends on current selection of uncommitted video and subtitle streams.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

selectSubtitle

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE selectSubtitle(int index)
Aelect subtitle stream by its index.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of subtitle stream. Valid from 0. The availability of subtitle selections depends on current selection of uncommitted video and audio selections.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

isVideoAvailable

boolean isVideoAvailable(int index)
Check if specified video stream is available for selection.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of video stream. Valid from 0. The availability of video streams depends on current selection of uncommitted audio and subtitle streams.
Returns:
true if specified video stream is available; false if not.

isAudioAvailable

boolean isAudioAvailable(int index)
Check if specified audio stream is available for selection.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of video stream. Valid from 0. The availability of audio streams depends on current selection of uncommitted video and subtitle streams.
Returns:
true if specified video stream is available; false if not.

isSubtitleAvailable

boolean isSubtitleAvailable(int index)
Check if specified subtitle stream is available for selection.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of video stream. valid from 0. The availability of subtitle streams depends on current selection of uncommitted video and audio streams.
Returns:
true if specified video stream is available; false if not.

commitSelection

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE commitSelection()
Commit all current asset selections. If any asset type is not selected, current playing asset of that type is used. This operation will remove all current selections after commit.

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

clearSelection

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE clearSelection()
Remove all current uncommitted selections

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

getVideoProperty

VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetProperty getVideoProperty(int index)
Retrieve the properties of specified video stream.

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of video stream. Valid from 0.
Returns:
a VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetProperty object if successful or null if failed. Returned object holds a list of key-value pairs where both key and value are of String type. Supported property keys are:

getAudioProperty

Parameters:

Returns:
a VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetProperty object if successful or null if failed. Returned object holds a list of key-value pairs where both key and value are of String type. Supported property keys are:

getSubtitleProperty

VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetProperty getSubtitleProperty(int index)

Parameters:
index - [in] Index of subtitle stream. valid from 0.
Returns:
a VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetProperty object if successful or null if failed. Returned object holds a list of key-value pairs where both key and value are of String type. Supported property keys are:

getPlayingAsset

VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetIndex getPlayingAsset()
Retrieve the assets which are currently being played; or default assets before playback

Returns:
a VOCommonPlayerAssetSelection.VOOSMPAssetIndex object if successful or null if failed. Returned object holds the current IDs of selected video, audio and subtitle streams.
